game.shortDescription: 세계적인 게임인 Tetris®와 SEGA의 뿌요뿌요™가 만나 경쟁적이고, 사랑스럽고, 중독성 있는 퍼즐 게임으로 합쳐졌습니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Two puzzle game juggernauts collide as global phenomenon Tetris® and SEGA’s famous Puyo Puyo™ combine in a super mash-up of ferocious competition, adorable looks, and addictive puzzle fun!

reviewHighlights.text: The best game besides player count. If people played this game like it was Fortnite, it would be a better world.
